column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: DNAP and DNX Indonesia employees delivered donations via the Indonesia Mining Department's Disaster Post in Cianjur (West Java), Indonesia, after a 5.6 magnitude earthquake in November 2022. Our employees donated essential items, including 100 packaged tents, mattresses, blankets, 2,000kg of raw rice, and 360 packages of diapers for children in need.
column20: Cianjur Earthquake, DNX Indonesia, donations

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: In March 2023, Dyno Nobel's Asia Pacific Hard Rock and Iron Ore teams hosted a day of fun with a purpose: a customer golf day in support of Beyond Blue Australia. About 100 participants gathered at the Vines Golf Resort in Whadjuk-Noongar country, including representatives from some of Australia's premier mining and mining services companies.
column20: Customer Golf Day, Beyond Blue Australia, Hard Rock

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Employees from our Graham, Kentucky site provided financial contributions to the local food pantry 'Hope to All Food Bank'. Several team members, some even accompanied by their families, went to the food bank to lend a helping hand and packaged hampers for needy families.

column13: Canada East operations donated CAD$15k to the Taykway Tagamou Nation (TNN) at Timmins in Ontario, Canada, for renovations at their recently acquired Veronica Archibald Healing Centre in Wade Lake, Ontario. The centre aims to provide land-based healing through a treatment centre and community programming designed for at-risk First Nations youth.

column13: In addition to minimum booster testing and Velocity of Detonation (VoD) measurement, Incitec Pivot strongly emphasises comprehensive blast chamber testing to gather crucial insights into the performance of explosive products. This testing process is conducted at the company's state-of-the-art Research and Development (R&D) test facility in the United States. The rigorous blast chamber tests allow Incitec Pivot to verify the gas components generated during explosive reactions.
